code: import moment from"moment";var constructSummaryAdult=function constructSummaryAdult(_ref){var data=_ref.data;if(!data)return[];var displayedAddress="".concat(data.address," ").concat(data.rt,"/").concat(data.rw," ").concat(data.village_string,", ").concat(data.district_string,", ").concat(data.city_string,", ").concat(data.province_string," ").concat(data.zip_code);var displayedDomicileAddress=!data.is_same_domicile?'-':"".concat(data.domicile_address," ").concat(data.domicile_rt,"/").concat(data.domicile_rw," ").concat(data.domicile_village_string,", ").concat(data.domicile_district_string,", ").concat(data.domicile_city_string,", ").concat(data.domicile_province_string," ").concat(data.domicile_zip_code);return[{key:"Nama",value:data.patient_name},{key:"NIK",value:data.id_card_number},{key:"No. Identitas Lain",value:data.other_id_card_number},{key:"Nama Ibu Kandung",value:data.mother_name},{key:"Tempat/Tanggal Lahir",value:"".concat(data.birthplace,", ").concat(moment(data.birthdate).format("DD MMMM YYYY"))},{key:"Jenis Kelamin",value:data.gender_string},{key:"Alamat",value:displayedAddress},{key:"Alamat Domisili",value:displayedDomicileAddress},{key:"No. HP",value:data.phone_number},{key:"No. Telepon Rumah",value:data.other_phone_number||'-'},{key:"Pendidikan Terakhir",value:data.education_string||'-'},{key:"Pekerjaan",value:data.job||'-'},{key:"Status Pernikahan",value:data.marital_string||'-'},{key:"Metode Pembayaran",value:"".concat(data.payment_method_string," ").concat(data.payment_method_other&&": ".concat(data.payment_method_other))}];};export default constructSummaryAdult;
